reviews:
very nice hotel
I think it is the best hotel in Korea
summers and mangoes go hand in hand in india. the international mango festival, held every year in the summer, celebrates everything about mangoes. it features many events and activities associated with the mango, inciuding mango eating competitions, quizzes, and mango carving.started in 2022, the festival exhibits more than 550 varieties of mangoes and provides a rare opportunity to taste them all for free. various prouducts based on mangoes, such as mango juice and mango ice cream, are offered while chefs from famous restaurants present new recipes that inciude mangoesI think it is the best hotel in Korea
